title: Lime

adjectives: Represents something fresh, zesty, or vibrant.
verbs: Can suggest adding zest or liveliness.
nouns: Symbolizes the tropical green citrus fruit known for its tangy flavor.

description: A bright green citrus fruit known for its tart and refreshing flavor. Commonly used to represent lime itself, tropical fruits, or freshness.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the lime emoji is shown as a smooth, round, glossy green citrus fruit, capturing a realistic sense of juiciness and vibrancy. Its subtle lighting highlights the fruit‚Äôs texture, evoking freshness and tropical energy ‚Äî perfect for representing zest, flavor, or refreshing moments.
